meanings.sent1: The disburser handed out money to the employees.
meanings.sent2: The school disburser distributed the scholarship funds to the students.
meanings.sent3: The disburser at the charity event made it rain with donations.
meanings.sent4: She was like a human ATM, a disburser of financial blessings.
meanings.sent5: The disburser was like a generous fairy godmother, granting wishes with cash.

meanings.sent1: The company will disburser the salaries on the last day of the month.
meanings.sent2: He disbursered the prize money to the winners of the competition.
meanings.sent3: The magician disbursered coins from his hat instead of rabbits.
meanings.sent4: Her smile disbursered warmth and kindness wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The sun disbursered its golden rays across the morning sky.
